website_summaries.verdict: Choose this scooper if you like the idea of a longer handle and low price. However, owners either love or dislike the design and features.
pros: Has a handle that's contoured and slightly longer than traditional scoops
Rubberized coating provides a slip-resistant grip
Large scoop top is designed to fit into tight crevices and corners
cons: Spaces between the slots are wide, so it won't work well with very fine litter
Long handle makes it difficult to store
Mixed opinions on the serrated edge

customer_reviews.title: I never knew I'd have a favorite litter scooper
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. never expected to have a favorite litter scoop, but when I got this I almost went ahead and just purchased one for every litter box in the house. The only thing stopping me was that it was a waste because I had perfectly functional scoopers already when I got this one for the other locations. Super recommend this for anybody who has trouble bending over or has litter boxes in hard-to-reach corners. Seems super sturdy I've been using it for several weeks now and I'm very very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine B.

customer_reviews.title: Long but good
customer_reviews.text: Long but good. I took pics to show it. I didn't know it was going to be so long but for a plastic scoop? This is great. It's really durable and scoops the poop and pee very well! I like how sturdy it is. I took a pic of it next to a tissue box because I wanted to show you how long it is. It's supposed to help you not have to bend down so much - I have't really noticed that positive but I do feel this thing is almost indestructible! I wish it came with a holder but alas it doesn't but for the price and quality? This is a great scoop!
customer_reviews.author: KathleenHemrichTop Contributor: Women's Fashion

customer_reviews.title: We have 8 indoor cats - this scoop is perfect!
customer_reviews.text: We volunteer at a local humane society and have acquired 3 of our 8 cats there. But, we've been a multi-cat household for many years before that...that means many years of scooping litter. We currently have 7 litter boxes and I've decided to upgrade all our litter scoops to this Petmate Ultimate Scoop after using it once. Not that scooping cat waste is my favorite task - but this scoop is that good. It makes the chore an easy one. Even my 13-year old commented that she loves this scoop. In her words: "It's sturdy and easy to use". If that means she'll clean litter boxes more often then the investment in these Ultimates are well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Cinci LinTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but weak handle
customer_reviews.text: For my usage scenario (from a wheelchair) this scoop works very well - proper length, fairly sturdy, and requires zero cleaning. Just right size seine holes/wide scoop, and is ergonomic during use. Only downside is that they tend to break at where the plastic changes color/casting material, on the handle. I get several years usage per scoop, though; and keep buying them, because they fit the bill so nicely (price is right, too). RECOMMENDED
customer_reviews.author: JRB

customer_reviews.title: Not as sturdy as previous version
customer_reviews.text: After several years of use, the two of this item I owned snapped at the thinnest part of the neck. I immediately reordered, happy with their previous lifetime. Both of these bent and are in danger of snapping in the first use. They are fine in regular scooping direction, but I pushed against some litter with the scoop facing down and they both bent and cracked. Not so heavy duty any more, just large.
customer_reviews.author: M. Clarkson

customer_reviews.title: Great shape, size, and grip
customer_reviews.text: I just got this, but so far it is great. I came to the realization that one of the reasons I dreaded cleaning the litter box was how so many scoops are tiny, flimsy, and inefficient. You have to crouch uncomfortably and kick up lots of dust and not do much with each scoop. With this one, you don't have to get down in to the litter box like others, and it gets a lot done with each scoop.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t make’em like they used to ...
customer_reviews.text: We purchased one of these more than five years ago and it performed well until it broke half way up the handle. Not bad for several years of use, so we ordered another but it appears they are skimping on the construction quality these days. Within just a couple of weeks the handle began to crack on our new purchase. We’ve now purchased a metal based scoop now.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Try another one of these...
customer_reviews.text: It's a very strong, ergonomic and well-priced scooper, however, this one has problems. A lot of the kitty poop sometimes falls out of the wide lines on the scooper. If only the lines were smaller than the large way they are, more poop would be able to be collected when using this scooper. Dislike this one. I'll probably use it for other purposes because this one is not so good for the cat box.
customer_reviews.author: Cesar Sotelo Jr.

customer_reviews.title: A sturdy plastic litter pan scoop with a long handle
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased one of these scoops for my mother who has two cats and will be 87 this December. Cleaning the cats' litter pan with an ordinary short handled scoop strains her back. This longer handle makes this chore easier for her. She's been using the long handled scoop for several years now - the plastic has not cracked and the handle is as good as ever. This time I've purchased this long handled scoop for my sister who not only has two cats but two children and can use all the helpful products she can get. Very good product.
customer_reviews.author: NC

customer_reviews.title: Holes too big, and doesn't scrape well
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this over a year. Pros: long handle. Cons: holes are too big so it just wont pick up smaller clumps, and the blunt serrated edge makes it impossible to scrape the bottom. Also clay builds up on it and sticks like glue. I plan to replace this with stainless steel scoop, which has better scraping ability and hopefully smaller holes.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT Scoop
customer_reviews.text: LOVE the extra long, ergonomic handle on this scoop! No more bending over to scoop the litter box. The serrated edge really helps in extracting litter clumps on the sides of the litter box. The scoop portion itself is quite deep & helps in getting up larger clumps. It is very sturdy & has a "substantial" feel to it. We use a sifting litter box, but this scoop is very handy for quick clean ups between siftings.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Perry

customer_reviews.title: Works well but didn't last a year before the handle broke - now the second one is broken in six months.
customer_reviews.text: Second one I purchased in less than a year because the handle broke off on the first one. So only 3 stars. When it's not broken it works well. Update: the second one has now broken (handle in the middle) after 6 months of use. The plastic is really really thin where it breaks, it's under the light grey soft rubber - a really terrible design - literally looks to be about 1/8" thick and just breaks from light use.
customer_reviews.author: The Cat Family

customer_reviews.title: Good litter scoop
customer_reviews.text: This has been my scoop of choice for quite a while now. It has a long handle to keep you away from any litter dust and the slots are pretty well spaced for anything except the smallest particles. The curve in the handle is just right so it makes for comfortable scooping. The handle does give out after a while so it doesn’t last more than a year or two but at this price it’s worth it!
customer_reviews.author: S. Peters

customer_reviews.title: Not quite ultimate.....
customer_reviews.text: This would be the perfect scoop BUT the front edge is saw toothed so you can't scrape the bottom of a box so when my cats dug down to bare catbox I would have to go get the old standard scoop to do the job. The tether also tend to clog full of damp clumping litter. Finally I just went back to the old Walmart scooper. I was also hoping that the holes would be a little bigger for the feline pine pellet litter. They let the new pellets thru but if they get the least bit wet no longer fit thru the holes. Got to admit tho, these people came close to designing the perfect scoop.
customer_reviews.author: S. Birch

customer_reviews.title: The whole scoop, and nothing but the scoop.
customer_reviews.text: This is a BIG scoop. But the longer handle is really nice - less bending down to scoop, and the scoop definitely collects and sifts the way it's supposed to. We dump the litter into biodegradable doggie poo bags to dispose of and sometimes the big scoop makes that a little difficult. Still, overall, seems sturdy and gets the job done. We put a nail in over the litter box and let it hand from there, so any leftover crumbs can just drop right back in. (Just got my cat last week so this is still a fairly new thing. Will update my review if my opinions change.)
customer_reviews.author: S. LeeTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Crap Attracts Crap
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievably, the manufacturer chose a material that litter sticks to, including dry, unsoiled liter. I even tried spraying it with non-stick cooking spray, which helped somewhat but not enough. And I certainly don’t want to have to go through that routine every night! It also requires extensive cleaning in a utility sink, every time. A well designed scoop should SAVE you time and effort. This does the opposite. Super-disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: AJJ108

customer_reviews.title: Breaks too easily...spend the extra few $$ on a solid metal one!
customer_reviews.text: Breaks too easily...I love the size and shape of this scoop but they just aren't sturdy enough. Especially for large litter boxes with deep litter. First one lasted almost a year, second one broke with a month or so. Spend a few dollars more on a solid metal scoop and you'll save in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Benson

customer_reviews.title: Best Scooper EVER
customer_reviews.text: I love my cats and my rabbits. But I hate scooping their litter. Of all the scoops I've tried, this one is the best. It's long so my hands/arms aren't in the actual litter box or touching the sides when the clumps are being difficult. It's super sturdy to get those hard to scoop clumps out providing the perfect amount of leverage. I've easily tried over twenty different scoops, and this one is just the easiest to use. I use a little command hook in a discrete place to keep it when it's not in use. We have three of them in my house and I won't use another product.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: The Cadillac of litter scoops!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the ultimate kitty litter scooper. I love that the handle length keeps me further from the litter, and the large size of the scoop makes the job go faster. It is incredibly tough and doesn't bend even with a heavy load. Mine finally did snap, but it had had a HEAVY work out for a couple years, and the price is so good, I didn't hesitate to buy another! It's the best scoop I've ever worked with! And the rubber handle is comfortable. It doesn't cut into your hand under pressure like the cheap ones that are hollow on the underside of the handle.
customer_reviews.author: S. R.

customer_reviews.title: Go Make a better mouse trap
customer_reviews.text: I liked the long handle but the scoop itself is too small for me personally I want them wider for my large cats. If you have a small to average size cat it should be fine. And the teeth On scoop part get filled easily with the waste.
customer_reviews.author: epw

customer_reviews.title: Skip this
customer_reviews.text: We had a scoop like this for many years—it finally broke and we needed to replace it, so we ordered this one. It lasted 2 months before breaking about halfway down the handle. We’re skipping plastic scoops from now one and going with metal.
customer_reviews.author: Furball

customer_reviews.title: Best litter scoop I've had ! Gets the smaller pieces, it's serrated & will scrape the bottom, strong too!
customer_reviews.text: Great scooper. It's strong, doesn't bend & is surrated so it really gets everything! Can't beat the price. I've gone thru several but this one I know will last! The handle has a nice rubber grip & it helps a lot so that it doesn't slip. The slots are not so big/wide that they leave behind small pieces of dirty litter. I was using 2 different ones, a small one to get the tiny pieces that break away , this picks it all up in one scooper! Very pleased. Should grab a few more before the price goes up double or triple like other items! Jenn~
customer_reviews.author: Jenn Reedy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This ended up being much better than I thought it would. The handle and really the whole this is very sturdy and comfortable to hold. I don't have to work as hard to get the poop out or bend down as much with the curve of the basket thingy.
customer_reviews.author: Alesada

customer_reviews.title: It's a scoop. For cat poop. No bait and switch here...
customer_reviews.text: Kind of hard to write a review for a tool used to scoop cat feces out of a box, but here goes... Has a handle that keeps your hand well away from the poop. Sifts the litter box medium away from the poop. Relocates cat poop from the litter box to a bag for disposal. We still have a kitten, so I can't yet comment on fecal capacity or handle shear strength. At that time, we will determine if this is truly the 'Ultimate' litter scoop that Petmate promises it is...
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Kuerth

customer_reviews.title: Long and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Mainly purchased because of the length. Use them everyday, several times a day. Great price. Does the job very well. The handle is long and strong. Customer for life. Thanks, CW.
customer_reviews.author: sweetkitties4

customer_reviews.title: Great Scoop
customer_reviews.text: I have RA that limits my ability to do most things. Scooping the cat box was a pain (literally). I bought the Tidy Cats Breeze System and needed a long handled scoop that could accommodate the pellets as well as deep enough to cradle the poop so I didn't have to chase them around the box. This scoop is wonderful. It is just the right length and depth, is strong and allows the pellets to drop through (you must shake the scoop so the pellets drop down) .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's HUGE
customer_reviews.text: This thing is huge...I mean seriously...like Tigers huge. That's not bad, but I was intending to empty sand filled ashtrays and it's bigger than the cans....fortunately my daughter has cats so we did a trade. For a litter box it'd be great, very solid item and a nice long handle...so use it as intended and you should be pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Smith

customer_reviews.title: Made of good plastic but not the best design
customer_reviews.text: It’s hard to get in the corners of the litter box because the handle is angled so much. It’s best to scoop small amounts of litter at a time because it hurts your hand to hold it with too much litter in the scoop
customer_reviews.author: Breanahines

customer_reviews.title: Everything Sticks!!!
customer_reviews.text: This scoop would be ok but everything sticks to it, the slots are wide so small pieces fall out and the bottom isn't smooth so you can't scrape anything fully. I hated it so much I had to order a different one in a week. The long handle is great but the rest of it is too irritating to keep using.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price, but openings are too wide
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Strong / sturdy, easy to use Cons: The openings are way too wide. You'll have to sweep the litter box twice: first with this piece, then with another with smaller/narrower openings to pick up the smaller ones.
customer_reviews.author: B.E.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome litter scoop
customer_reviews.text: Awesome litter scoop!! I love the long handle. I don't get the people who said the clumps just fell right through. We have two smallish cats inside and this litter scoop works just great for them. If you wanted a litter scoop for small kittens, however, I would suggest that you buy one with smaller holes. I've had it for two months now and it still works fine.
customer_reviews.author: L. Breneman

customer_reviews.title: Great scoop but week handle.
customer_reviews.text: Works well, gets a bit stuck with litter debris but not bad enough not to buy this scoop. The only issue with this scoop is the handle that keeps breaking needing replacement. Wish it was sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Best long handled option
customer_reviews.text: The longest hand out there- I’m not sure why so many people break the handle- I had my last one for 4 years before I broke it. It’s plastic but it’s good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Snopes p.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: The handle is too long. It is not ergonomically design. This scoop is extremely difficult to use.
customer_reviews.author: tenise

customer_reviews.title: Very long handful.
customer_reviews.text: These seem to big for average cat box. Not the adopter the handle. Also they have "teeth" which I should have picked up on prior to purchase. Does not work well with pine pellets..difficult to pick up saw dust.
customer_reviews.author: Denise King

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as it looks
customer_reviews.text: I wish that I could say that I like this. Aesthetically it is good looking. The length is that perfect bit of extra long for reaching the litter box. Unfortunately, I thought the serrated edge would be helpful, when in fact it breaks up the waste too much and makes it difficult for cleaning the litter box.
customer_reviews.author: ESobek

customer_reviews.title: Cleaning Is A Breeze
customer_reviews.text: This is me second petmate scooper for my 2 cats. I now have my son's 2 cats so I got another one. They are wonderful, not being so close to get the smell or the dust.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly with Yesterday's News Litter
customer_reviews.text: After asking my question about using with Yesterday's News Litter, I went ahead and ordered one to test since the slots appeared to be larger than "usual." I am happy to report that this scoop does indeed work perfectly with the shape of the Yesterday's News Litter! (YNL is slightly narrower than Feline Pine). I ordered three more just now to go with my other litter boxes. I hope others are able to find this when they look at Yesterday's News Litter!
customer_reviews.author: Mom2ZnAA

customer_reviews.title: Cat's Delight
customer_reviews.text: Due to arthritis and back pain I had become unable to scoop Thomas's litter box after each use as I had been doing and had to rely on a once a day service by a caregiver. This distressed both me and my adorable 10-yr-old rescue cat and he began holding his urine until the box was clean -- not healthy for a cat his age. The day before this scoop arrived, he watched her leave, and as soon as the door shut behind her, he got up and went to the litter box. This scoop has made it possible for me to attend to his comfort myself and we are both delighted. Just sign me A cat slave!!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Petmate Ultimate Litter Scoop Defective Product Design
customer_reviews.text: OK. The handle to this scoop is two pieces. After a short period of use the handle breaks into with very little pressure. Maybe because the glue binding the two pieces together is not strong enough, don't know. Works well the short time it works but I won't buy another one and I have had 3 or 4 and the same thing happened. Too bad. I liked the design
customer_reviews.author: D. Bell

customer_reviews.title: Amazing how much this helps!  Great design.
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I'm very impressed with how well designed this item is. I was not prepared for how much easier it would be on my back to clean the litter box with a better tool. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Robin StarFisch

customer_reviews.title: Serrated edge is no good
customer_reviews.text: This litter scoop isn't the worst I've dealt with, but could be better. It has a serrated edge that, in my experience, tends to break clumps stuck to the bottom into smalley pieces rather than taking the clump as a whole. It is sturdy, but if it had a straight flat edge, it would be much much better.
customer_reviews.author: jrf

customer_reviews.title: handles are breaking after one year
customer_reviews.text: Over time I purchased six of these litter scoops so each litter box has its own scoop.. They are designed to efficiently scoop with minimal wrist strain. Really feel this long handle design is far superior to other litter scoops I purchased over the years. However, after a year of use, the upper handle is breaking in two. This breaking is occurring on three of the six scoops. Not a good thing. I taped the handles but the scoops are still breaking. At their price, I may not purchase this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Spain

customer_reviews.title: Best litter scoop around
customer_reviews.text: I have had cats for most of my 46 years and have used my share of cat litter scoops. This one is the absolute best! It is super sturdy and has a long handle for reaching all the way in the back corners of the box. I have one and bought one for my daughter for her cat litter box.
customer_reviews.author: DACOW

customer_reviews.title: This is the BEST scoop!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best scoop! The extra long handle makes it so much easier to scoop my large, covered litter boxes. It reaches into the back of the pan without having to take off the lid. The rigidity and size of the scoop itself allows you to scoop multiple deposits at the same time. I highly recommend this scoop!
customer_reviews.author: Darby

customer_reviews.title: Best scooper EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I am a cat owner and a cat sitter. I have used my fair share of good AND awful litter scoopers. When I catsat for a lady who had one of these, I immediately grilled her on where she got it and got my own right away! It's FABULOUS! It scoops up a lot at once. The litter drops quickly through and the handle is long so it doesn't feel like your hand is in the litterbox. I scoop a lot of boxes on a daily basis and wish every house had this! BEST EVER!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Would Buy Again
customer_reviews.text: Love the non-slip handle. I keep the litter box next to a toilet. allows me to sit on the toilet lid while scooping out the litter straight into my trash can. Used with Jonny Cat Litter & Dr. Elsey's ; effortless sifting ! Would be nice, if handle was long enough to sift while standing, I think.
customer_reviews.author: Emm

customer_reviews.title: Descent pet litter scoop
customer_reviews.text: Nice pet scoop. Handle was a little longer than anticipated. Handle length makes scooping thick layer of litter & waste less stable than desired.
customer_reviews.author: NjMc

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Its pretty big compared to other options, but very sturdy and makes the litter box cleaning task very quick. It’s also less expensive than the options I was seeing in pet stores, so I’d recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product
customer_reviews.text: I used this a few times and then it snapped as I was scooping. It's very flimsy. I wouldn't recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing!
customer_reviews.text: WHY have I never had a long handled scoop before? This scoop has been a lifesaver for my back. I have 5 litterboxes and scooping them was literally the worst part of my day because my back and knees would absolutely kill me (and I'm really not that old). Now, scooping still sucks but not nearly as much. I have 2 of these, and I would recommend them to anyone, especially if you have multiple boxes or issues bending over.
customer_reviews.author: Juliana M.

customer_reviews.title: Long handle is a back saver!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the long handle on this! I’m old and decrepit so bending over isn’t pleasant. With this I happily scoop the litter box every night!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Don't recommend
customer_reviews.text: Wayyyyy to long of handle. It's hard to get leverage to even scoop without flinging litter everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: TAC

customer_reviews.title: Not Entirely Thrilled With Scoop
customer_reviews.text: I love the size of this scoop, but the holes are way too large. It makes it difficult to really "clean up" our multi-cat box. Ever seen a Maine Coon cat??? Well, we have 3. So, we clean their box EVERY day... we just have to.
customer_reviews.author: Nance

customer_reviews.title: Long handle and sturdy construction gives convenience and durability.
customer_reviews.text: I like this scoop because of the longer handle and its sturdy construction. Have 2 of these and they have lasted a long time. The only downside is the overly wide spacing between the strainer portion of the product. It allows too large pieces to fall back into the litter box.
customer_reviews.author: AMZ1

customer_reviews.title: Long handle is convenient but not substantial
customer_reviews.text: I really like the long handle and the size of the scoop but could hear it pop & snap when scooping with it and tonight CRACK! the handle broke off. I have another just like it and I'm not sure which was purchased first.
customer_reviews.author: KATHY

customer_reviews.title: Only peasants use short handled scoops.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is god's gift to cat owners. I have 6 cats, and that's a lot of cat crap. I do a lot of scoopin. Once I got this thing, I never looked back (this is my second one in about two years. The handle eventually broke on the first one). I even converted my pet sitter!
customer_reviews.author: amandagreenway

customer_reviews.title: Long handle less hassle
customer_reviews.text: Love the length. Perfect for hooded litter boxes or to ease stooping so low. This is sturdy and the shape works well. I do wish the slots were a little tighter so smaller stuff doesn't fall through.
customer_reviews.author: 2redhot

customer_reviews.title: Did not last. Handle broke first, scoop plastic bits followed.
customer_reviews.text: Handle broke shortly after purchase, but still usable with half a handle, albeit not pleasant. Plastic "strainer" section of scoop individual plastic tines went missing one at a time so no longer usable. Had it for almost four months total. Won't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: powderhound

customer_reviews.title: Study and Well-Designed
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good scoop. I've had an assortment of scoops over the years and this is really good. First of all, it's sturdy. I've had plastic scoops and one metal scoop that broke or split. The handle on this scoop fits the hand nicely, which does make a difference, especially if you have multiple cats.
customer_reviews.author: Cleo

customer_reviews.title: I like this scooper a lot
customer_reviews.text: I like this scooper a lot. Its sort of ergonomic in that it has a nice indent where your thumb should go and the length of the handle makes scooping not as hard on my back. I wish it were metal so I could santize it a bit better, but that's my only complaint!
customer_reviews.author: Arya

customer_reviews.title: Excellent scoop!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent scoop! I have back problems, and the extended handle helps me to take care of my cats without as much bending and straining. It works exactly as I want it to, and what more could i ask!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Extremely sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy - you would have a hard time breaking this scoop. Nice long handle
customer_reviews.author: Grandma C

customer_reviews.title: Great Scooper
customer_reviews.text: Very good scooper. It's little large but very efficient. I've bought 2 over the past 3 years and I will never change. The holes are not too big, catches a lot and strong a good choice for your cat. =0)
customer_reviews.author: Rocko's Human Mom Las Vegas

customer_reviews.title: Worst scooper ever
customer_reviews.text: It only looks good but practically it is impossible to scoop litter properly. It does not dig deep and actually break the litter into pieces which you are trying to scoop. It is also extremely uncomfortable to use and not easy on the arm.
customer_reviews.author: Faiza

customer_reviews.title: It does not work... Needs to be redesigned
customer_reviews.text: The length of the handle is great; ideal if you ask me. However, the scoop design is terrible. It does not catch all the smaller clumps (just a matter of making the spacing a mm or 2 smaller) and the very tip of the scoop should be flat, without ridges. Keep it simple and with a long handle and I will buy it. This one is being returned!
customer_reviews.author: qaztor

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This is my third one over ten years- the longer handle means my hands don’t get dirty, and it’s very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: E. Voight

customer_reviews.title: Best scooper ever!
customer_reviews.text: So glad I got this! The handle makes it easier to scoop & is more comfortable than a regular scooper. Old scooper hurt my wrist. It really gets the clumps on the bottom. I looked at different ones before choosing this one. Every time I use it, I am so glad i got it. Super great price, worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: sparky jonze

customer_reviews.title: Strong, but ehh
customer_reviews.text: I thought I would like this because it looks nice and sturdy - and it is. It's much larger than I anticipated as well. What I have issue with is due to the way the teeth are designed on the end, it doesn't trap "stuff" against the side like my other flat sided scooper. That means some of the small "stuff" I'm trying to scoop up falls through. I feel like they didn't really test this in real life or they would have noticed that.
customer_reviews.author: emc

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Allows you to stay a safe distance away from the litter
customer_reviews.text: Won't ever go back to using a plain cheap scooper again! Ergonomic design allows you to scoop up the most difficult to clean areas and not have to grip it any lower. I had one break on me, but it endured heavy use for a long time, so I'm not turned off. I ordered another one. This scooper is still stronger than any other I've had. It doesn't feel flimsy at all. This scooper is large and in charge!
customer_reviews.author: A. Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I have a very large custom litter box with a top and this helps me reach all the way to the back with problem.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Winchell

customer_reviews.title: Definitely the Ultimate Litter Scoop!
customer_reviews.text: I may order one or two more, since I have 8 litter boxes in my home! This is exactly what I was looking for! I read reviews about how massive it is, so I was expecting a really huge scoop. This is not *not* big... it is very good sized, and just what I was looking for, honestly. The handle is long and very sturdy, and the scoop just as sturdy. This is the best litter scoop, and very reasonably priced! Very good quality!
customer_reviews.author: E. Smart

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: It gets the job done but it is hard plastic not metal.
customer_reviews.author: Teeny LEE

customer_reviews.title: quality
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had this scoop years ago! It is so sturdy and I love the long handle!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon B

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but handle too long
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and a nice rounded, solid handle. But for me the handle is just too long as it makes the scoop unwieldy to use and scrape out the clumps of litter. Also, some very small clumps fall thru the scoop back into the litter pan.
customer_reviews.author: SandyHill

customer_reviews.title: Petmate Little Scoop
customer_reviews.text: Let's face it, there is nothing great about cleaning a cat litter box, but this scoop certainly makes it better. I don't have to get in the floor to clean it now, just bend down and the long handle and big scoop does the rest. I wish the sections were slightly closer together as some smaller pieces slip through the slots, but all in all this is a vast improvement over any litter scoop I have ever used. The longer handle and slight bend at the scoop really work well.
customer_reviews.author: Pattig144

customer_reviews.title: Best Scooper Ever
customer_reviews.text: I love the long handle. There is no reason to have to be so close the the litter....is there? It's also very sturdy. I don't know about you...but I have gone through a few cheap cat scoopers to have it break at the worst time. Never again with this one. This is the real deal. This will be the last cat scooper you buy.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for scooping the poop
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for scooping the poop!! If you have larger cats it will eventually weaken & break at the top of the handle, but it lasts a year or more - so for the price it is worth it. Buy more than one at a time is my advice.
customer_reviews.author: Erica M. Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Broke after two weeks use.
customer_reviews.text: Less than two weeks old and my 16 eight scoop broke and is now a 12 each scoop. Worked great until it broke. Guess I’ll try a metal one this time.
customer_reviews.author: nukegvj

customer_reviews.title: Good long handle
customer_reviews.text: The long handle is great, and it's attractive. Would prefer tighter "holes," since anything which isn't in a tight clump falls back into the box.
customer_reviews.author: KS in NYC

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than expected ! Made well!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great!! It's really big, I did not expect it to be so solid and sturdy. The only thing is I wish the slots were a bit smaller so the tiny poop would not fall through but over all it's nice! I would recommend! Made very well!
customer_reviews.author: Harmony A.Top Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: YAS
customer_reviews.text: My go-to kitty poop scoop! We bought one YEARS ago at petco. It lasted 10+ years. Bought this when I bought the amazing natures miracle corner cat box!!
customer_reviews.author: Abby Normal

customer_reviews.title: The best litter scoop on the market
customer_reviews.text: Oh the little things in life that make it so much easier. It is the perfect length so that you don't have to bend down too much and it's strong enough so that you don't have to worry about it snapping in half or flipping a lump back up into your face. Bought one initially and then came back and bought one for each box. =^..^=
customer_reviews.author: drkat

customer_reviews.title: Longer, strong, deep enough for larger cats - great scoop!!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a scoop that would be big enough to handle waste from my 11 lb cats - both deep and broad scoop, and strong, but also with a longer handle as I had just gone through hip replacement surgery and could not bend over too far. This was exactly what I was looking for! While it isn't super long, it added just enough length for me to scoop while sitting on a stool. And the size and strength is just right, the grip on the handle with the indentation for the thumb, just perfect. Love, love this scoop.
customer_reviews.author: Addicted to Audible

customer_reviews.title: Too Big!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This litter scooper is way too big and ends up hurting your wrist using this scooper. It is way to wide on the handle. This is actually made for a man with huge hands.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Viertel

customer_reviews.title: It works for me
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with it. I like the long handle and it’s sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: CharPhilli

customer_reviews.title: I like this WAY better than metal scoops I have paid ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my third time buying this scoop. They break down and fall apart after about 2 years, but they're cheap enough that is expected. I like this WAY better than metal scoops I have paid more money for. Long handle. I lucked out and got blue as desired.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: This is fantastic! I do agree with other reviews that the openings are slightly larger and allows smaller tidbits to slip through. Its a great deal and definately worth a try
customer_reviews.author: OpheliaS

customer_reviews.title: Pet mate Ultimate long handle litter scooper
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, long handled litter scooper really does help keep me from getting litter all over me. It's one of the best scoopers iced ever used. I just wish the groves were closer to get more of the smaller pieces of junk. It doesn't scratch up the bottom of the litter box like the metal scooper did .
customer_reviews.author: Kepela

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted and is the perfect size, but I've almost broken the handle as ...
customer_reviews.text: The manufacturer really needs to reinforce the plastic handle with a metal strip. Exactly what I wanted and is the perfect size, but I've almost broken the handle as it is not really strong enough to dig through the litter.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan M.

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and durable
customer_reviews.text: I like that its strong and sturdy I just wish the handle was longer
customer_reviews.author: Linda Wilder

customer_reviews.title: Durable, well made and long handle is great but slots are a bit too wide
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the long, ergonomic handle so my hands aren't as close to my cat's waste. Don't like that small bits frequently get left behind. If only the slots were thinner, this would be perfect. The slots are 5/16" wide, just over 1/4". Overall, it's 17-3/4" long and 6" wide.
customer_reviews.author: L.A. Daddy

customer_reviews.title: best scoop i've ever used
customer_reviews.text: this is the best scoop i have ever used because it is very big, it it very upright so its easy to use, and the holes are very wide so the litter sifts through it in an instant.
customer_reviews.author: OpenMind

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: I have a bad back. This enables me to take care of my cat.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for an elder person, allows one to clean litter boxes with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Linda L.

customer_reviews.title: Some reviewers don't like the serrated edge
customer_reviews.text: Some reviewers don't like the serrated edge, but I was looking for just that feature - my cat likes to pee right on the side of the litter box, and this seems to create an impenetrable, cement-like clump that is really hard to remove. I was afraid I was going to break my other scooper. I do agree with some of the comments about the holes being too big. I kept my old scoop and just use that one for the smaller chunks. This scoop is quite large but very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: enchiladaplate

customer_reviews.title: Huge. Good if you own a Tiger.
customer_reviews.text: Writing this a second time since everything just deleted. This scoop is HUGE. I cant even hang it on the hook on the litter box. Its ridiculous. What a waste- now I have to buy another one! Not happy at all.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Love this scooper!
customer_reviews.text: Just a warning here: as others have noted this thing is really big! I feel like I'm shoveling out the litterboxes rather than scooping. It's very durable and strong. I bought another one that was metal and after 6 months or so the handle started bending. I don't that will be an issue with this one. Very happy with this purchase. Oh also, I've read some negativity about the 'teeth' on the front of the scooper. I think they work great and have had no issue with the litter breaking up.
customer_reviews.author: molsongrrrl

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, good grip with a hole for hanging.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy with good grip. The hole on the handle is a plus for hanging it up.
customer_reviews.author: Eun Shin

customer_reviews.title: Large cat scoop. Sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Nice sturdy scoop. I've owned two. And should I be clumsy and step on this one and break it... like I did the last one, i will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Darcey Harrison

product_meta.title: Doskocil Petmate Ultimate Litter Plastic Scoop 22972, Colors May Vary
product_meta.description: Petmate Ultimate Litter Plastic Scoop 22972, Colors may Vary
feature_bullets: Ergonomically designed litter scoop, enables consumers to clean the litter box while standing
Extra-large scoop sifts faster than average scoops
Serrated edge gets under the toughest mess

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
